name: Mary MacKillop
what_did:
Mary MacKillop helped start schools for poor children in Australia.
She became a nun and created the Sisters of St Joseph.
She worked hard to bring education to the outback.
why_matters:
Mary made sure all kids, even the poor, could go to school.
She showed kindness, bravery, and strong faith.
She became Australia’s first saint.

questions.q: Where did she help teach children?
Why is she important in religion?

fun_fact: She’s the only Australian saint recognized by the Catholic Church!
